posts.post_content:
SOLD

Gorgeous card in all aspects, but corners. Amazing color, focus, and centering for the grade. Presents much nicer then the numerical grade. 

email me if want back scan or more pic
[url]rubenb777@gmail.com[/url]

Super nice 3.  If that card isn't a half grade bump (3.5) I don't know what qualifies!

GLWS
Agreed 100% Scott. Doesn't get any better :D
I keep stopping on this thread just to look at it again.  Beautiful card.
Ruben, you have a spectacular Johnson.

[quote name="Jobu" post=1587135]Ruben, you have a spectacular Johnson.[/QUOTE]

almost fell off my chair with that one.  
And just to add... one of the better 100+ year old johnson's out there I would guess
I buy PSA 4s because they are in my price range. And this card is as good or better than a 4. Although I havent seen the back.
Damn, that is a nice card.  I would have been all over that had I logged in yesterday.  Congrats to the purchaser!
